function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for IoT technologies in buildings due to COVID-19","Impact":"Potential over-reliance on IoT for disease control","Mitigation":"Diversify disease control measures beyond IoT solutions","Technologies":"IoT, building automation systems","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, building owners","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Conversion of malls to warehouses due to e-commerce growth","Impact":"Reduction in public spaces and potential congestion in warehouses","Mitigation":"Development of alternative public spaces and efficient warehouse management","Technologies":"E-commerce platforms, warehouse management systems","People":"Retail customers, warehouse workers","Owner":"Retail management, warehouse operators"},{"Description":"Capacity shortages of data centers due to remote work trends","Impact":"Disruption in digital services and potential data security risks","Mitigation":"Expansion of data center capacity and robust data security measures","Technologies":"Data center infrastructure, cybersecurity solutions","People":"Remote workers, online service users","Owner":"Data center operators, cybersecurity experts"}]}
